text: Gunzenhausen (; ) is a town in Weißenburg-Gunzenhausen in Bavaria, Germany. It is on the river Altmühl, northwest of Weißenburg in Bayern, and southwest of Nuremberg. Gunzenhausen is a nationally recognized recreation area. It is noted as being at one end of part of The Limes Germanicus, a Roman border wall, and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. ==Twin towns and cities== Gunzenhausen is twinned with: * - Frankenmuth, Michigan United States * - Isle, Haute- Vienne France ==References== Category:Weißenburg-Gunzenhausen
title: Gunzenhausen
